抓.definition: to grab; to catch; to arrest; to snatch; to scratch

抓住.definition: to grab hold of; to capture

抓傷.definition: to injure by scratching or clawing

抓功夫.definition: to maximize one's time; to catch some time out; to find enough time; (also 抓工夫)

抓包.definition: to catch sb in the act; (computing) to capture data packets

抓周.definition: custom of placing a variety of articles (writing brush, abacus etc) before an infant on its first birthday to see which one he or she picks up (The article chosen is supposed to be an indication of the child's inclinations, future career etc.)

抓哏.definition: (of a comedian) to seize on something sb has just said or done to make an ad lib joke

抓大放小.definition: (PRC, mid-1990s) to restructure the large state-owned enterprises (SOEs) controlled by the central government and privatize smaller SOEs at the local level

抓姦.definition: to catch a couple in the act (adultery, illicit sexual relations)

抓嫖.definition: (of the police) to hunt prostitutes and their clients

抓子兒.definition: kids' game involving throwing and grabbing

抓工夫.definition: to maximize one's time; to catch some time out; to find enough time; (also 抓功夫)

抓拍.definition: to capture (an image); to snap (a photo)

抓撓.definition: to scratch; to mess about with; to quarrel; to scramble to do; sb or sth that one can rely on

抓狂.definition: to blow one's top; to be driven mad; to become frantic

抓猴.definition: (Tw) to catch an adulterous man in the act (from Taiwanese 掠猴, Tai-lo pr. [lia̍h-kâu])

抓緊.definition: to keep a firm grip on; to pay close attention to; to lose no time in (doing sth)

抓緊時間.definition: to waste no time in (doing sth); to hurry up

抓耳撓腮.definition: to tweak one's ears and scratch one's cheeks (as an expression of anxiety, delight, frustration etc) (idiom)

抓藥.definition: to make up a prescription (of herbal medicine)

抓辮子.definition: to grab sb by the pigtail; to seize on weak points; to exploit the opponent's shortcomings

抓飯.definition: pilaf (rice dish popular in many parts of the world, including Xinjiang)

抓餅.definition: fluffy, flaky pancake (made with dough, not batter)
